query:
-- Camera Capture Schedules
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS camera_capture_schedules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  camera_id INT NOT NULL,
  is_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  capture_interval_seconds INT DEFAULT 60 NOT NULL,
  capture_interval_unit ENUM('seconds', 'minutes', 'hours') DEFAULT 'minutes' NOT NULL,
  start_time VARCHAR(10),
  end_time VARCHAR(10),
  active_days JSON,
  production_line_id INT,
  workstation_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  auto_analyze BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  analysis_type ENUM('defect_detection', 'quality_inspection', 'measurement', 'ocr', 'custom') DEFAULT 'quality_inspection',
  notify_on_ng BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  notify_on_warning BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  notification_emails JSON,
  webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  total_captures INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  success_captures INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  failed_captures INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  last_capture_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_capture_status ENUM('success', 'failed', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending',
  last_capture_error TEXT,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_capture_schedule_camera (camera_id),
  INDEX idx_capture_schedule_enabled (is_enabled),
  INDEX idx_capture_schedule_line (production_line_id)
);
command:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS camera_capture_schedules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  camera_id INT NOT NULL,
  is_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  capture_interval_seconds INT DEFAULT 60 NOT NULL,
  capture_interval_unit ENUM('seconds', 'minutes', 'hours') DEFAULT 'minutes' NOT NULL,
  start_time VARCHAR(10),
  end_time VARCHAR(10),
  active_days JSON,
  production_line_id INT,
  workstation_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  auto_analyze BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  analysis_type ENUM('defect_detection', 'quality_inspection', 'measurement', 'ocr', 'custom') DEFAULT 'quality_inspection',
  notify_on_ng BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  notify_on_warning BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  notification_emails JSON,
  webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  total_captures INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  success_captures INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  failed_captures INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  last_capture_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_capture_status ENUM('success', 'failed', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending',
  last_capture_error TEXT,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_capture_schedule_camera (camera_id),
  INDEX idx_capture_schedule_enabled (is_enabled),
  INDEX idx_capture_schedule_line (production_line_id)
);
